workflow.name: Automate employee recognition with Slack, Sheets, Gmail & optional GPT-4
workflow.description:
# Automated Employee Recognition Bot with Slack + Google Sheets + Gmail

## Description

Turn employee recognition into an automated system.

This workflow celebrates great work instantly  it posts recognition messages on Slack, sends thank-you emails via Gmail, and updates your tracking sheet automatically.

Your team feels appreciated.
Your HR team saves hours.
Everyone wins.

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

1. You add a new recognition in Google Sheets.
2. The bot automatically celebrates it in Slack.
3. The employee receives a thank-you email.
4. HR gets notified and the sheet updates itself.

---

## üîß Setup Steps

#### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Prepare Your Google Sheet

Create a sheet called **‚ÄúEmployee_Recognition_List‚Äù** with these columns:
`Name | Department | Reason | Date | Email | Status | EmailStatus`
Then add one test row ‚Äî for example, your own name ‚Äî to see it work.

---

#### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Connect Your Apps

Inside n8n:

* **Google Sheets:** Connect your Google account so the bot can read the sheet.
* **Slack:** Connect your Slack workspace to post messages in a channel (like `#general`).
* **Gmail:** Connect your Gmail account so the bot can send emails automatically.

---

#### 3Ô∏è‚É£ (Optional) Add AI Personalization

If you want the messages to sound more natural, add an OpenAI node with this prompt:

> ‚ÄúWrite a short, friendly recognition message for {{name}} from {{dept}} who was recognized for {{reason}}. Keep it under 2 sentences.‚Äù

This makes your Slack and email messages feel human and genuine.

---

#### 4Ô∏è‚É£ Turn It On

Once everything‚Äôs connected:

* Save your workflow
* Set it to **Active**
* Add a new row in your Google Sheet

The bot will instantly post on Slack and send a thank-you email üéâ

Make it sound genuine and positive, under 2 sentences.

parameters.content:
# Employee Recognition Bot

## Problem

Manually recognizing employees is inconsistent. HR often forgets to announce wins, send thank-you emails, or update sheets ‚Äî hurting morale and culture.

## Solution

This **n8n workflow automates recognition** from Google Sheets ‚Üí Slack ‚Üí Gmail.
Add a new entry in Google Sheets, and it will:

* Announce it instantly in Slack
* Send a personalized thank-you email
* Update the sheet automatically

Zero manual work. 100% consistent recognition.

## What It Does

* Watches Google Sheets for new recognitions
* Sends Slack announcements & thank-you emails
* Marks each as ‚ÄúAnnounced‚Äù and ‚ÄúEmail Sent‚Äù
* Notifies HR if any step fails
* (Optional) Uses AI to write personalized messages

## For Who

HR teams, founders, or managers who want an **automated, zero-cost** way to boost morale and culture.

## Setup (Simple)

1. Create Google Sheet ‚Üí `Name | Department | Reason | Date | Email | Status | EmailStatus`
2. Connect Google Sheets, Slack, and Gmail in n8n
3. Add your Slack channel and Gmail email template
4. (Optional) Add OpenAI node for AI-written messages
5. Activate workflow ‚Üí Recognition runs on autopilot

Connect me on Linkedin for custom solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
